name: Elemental Pinball [PSX]
description:
Elemental Pinball is a pinball game with a large play area where abilities can be used to navigate the board and try to get a high score. Rack up energy by earning points and use that energy to contruct rocks in the environment or airstreams that can push your pinball. Grab the bonus from each of the 4 areas in the board to spawn a power up in the middle and earn a large point bonus.

Controls:

A/D for left and right flippers respectively

Left click + drag to use the airstream ability

Right click to summon rocks

escape to pause
